data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Nii é loozu é zoloo guye wooi ma, nii daa ga: «Mina koloɠolo!» Azafe ná-guyei. Guyei.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛ ma: «Siɛgi gè teʋeai ba, naa a zeelina,
Eteai ɠa ɲiikpi, ta nii kpein é zeini su,
«Nà bosu naati ma, niiti ti wasosu ga: ‹À mina waso pa!›
À mina gaazulɛ ɠula ga GALA!
À suɠwɛɛ ga nui ná-bɔɔlɔlai la zeɠezu folo ɠulazu ʋelei,
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ka é tukpɔi ɠaaleʋezu,
Ziawɔi ɠa zoni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya,
Nɔ̀un nà, gè la looɠoga bo fai ʋa ɠɔ,
Toɠa faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-wasogi zuɠaleɠale,
